admin.title: Web Conferencing Administration
admin.info: Web Conferencing can be handled by different providers. You can enable the provider you need and configure settings.

WebRTC.name: WebRTC
WebRTC.description: Default provider based on WebRTC standard. Let users to place peer to peer call. No browser plugin needed.

Skype.name: Skype
Skype.description: Provider for Skype. Let users to place group and 1:1 calls. No plugin required but Skype app must be installed on client.
